taskDescription:
Build a PMP 2026 Study Application - a web-based exam preparation tool with flashcards, practice tests, and progress tracking organized by PMP 2026 ECO Domains and Tasks.

Technology Stack:
- Frontend: Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Zustand (state), SWR (data fetching)
- Backend: Python FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, Alembic (migrations)
- Database: PostgreSQL
- Hosting: Render

PMP 2026 ECO Structure:
- Domain 1: People (33% weight, 8 tasks)
- Domain 2: Process (41% weight, 10 tasks)
- Domain 3: Business Environment (26% weight, 8 tasks)

Key features: Anonymous user sessions, SM-2 spaced repetition for flashcards, practice tests with immediate feedback, progress tracking with visualizations.

features.description: Phase 1A: Initialize Next.js 14 frontend with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and project structure (src/app, src/components, src/lib, src/store, src/types folders)
Phase 1B: Initialize FastAPI backend with SQLAlchemy, Alembic, requirements.txt, config.py, database.py, and Dockerfile
Phase 1C: Set up PostgreSQL connection, create initial Alembic migration setup, and configure CORS for local development
Phase 2A: Create SQLAlchemy models for Domain, Task, Flashcard, Question tables with relationships
Phase 2B: Create SQLAlchemy models for User, FlashcardProgress, QuestionProgress, StudySession tables
Phase 2C: Create Pydantic schemas for all models (request/response schemas)
Phase 2D: Seed PMP 2026 data - 3 domains with 26 tasks, sample flashcards (5-10 per task), and sample questions (3-5 per task) based on the official ECO
Phase 3A: Create domain and task API routes (GET /api/domains, GET /api/domains/:id/tasks)
Phase 3B: Create flashcard API routes (GET /api/flashcards with filters, POST /api/flashcards/:id/review with SM-2 algorithm)
Phase 3C: Create question API routes (GET /api/questions with filters, POST /api/questions/:id/answer)
Phase 3D: Create progress API routes (GET /api/progress/summary, GET /api/progress/domain/:id)
Phase 3E: Create auth API routes (POST /api/auth/anonymous, POST /api/auth/register, POST /api/auth/login with JWT)
Phase 4A: Create frontend layout with responsive sidebar navigation, header, and main content area
Phase 4B: Create base UI components (Button, Card, Modal, Input, Select) with Tailwind styling
Phase 4C: Set up API client with SWR, Zustand stores for user and progress state, and TypeScript types
Phase 4D: Create Dashboard page showing domain overview cards with progress indicators
Phase 5A: Create flashcard selection pages (domain/task selection)
Phase 5B: Create FlashcardComponent with flip animation, FlashcardDeck, and StudySession components
Phase 5C: Implement flashcard study flow with Know it/Don't know it buttons, session summary, and progress tracking
Phase 6A: Create practice test selection pages (domain/task selection)
Phase 6B: Create QuestionComponent, AnswerOptions, TestSession, and ScoreSummary components
Phase 6C: Implement practice test flow with immediate feedback, explanations, and exam simulation mode
Phase 7: Create progress tracking page with overall mastery, domain breakdown, study streaks, time tracking, charts (recharts), and weak areas identification
Phase 8A: Create auth pages (login, register) with form validation
Phase 8B: Implement anonymous session persistence, JWT token auth, profile settings, and data sync on registration
Phase 9: Create render.yaml blueprint, production Dockerfiles, environment configuration, and deploy to Render
